function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reluctance to adopt protective behaviors","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Education and promotion of the benefits of protective behaviors","Technologies":"Informational campaigns, social media, and educational materials","People":"General population","Owner":"Health organizations and government agencies"},{"Description":"Gender and age disparities in adopting protective behaviors","Impact":"Unequal protection against contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Tailored educational and outreach programs for underrepresented groups","Technologies":"Targeted advertising, community outreach, and educational workshops","People":"Women and older individuals","Owner":"Health organizations and community leaders"},{"Description":"Influence of official advice on protective behaviors","Impact":"Dependence on the accuracy and reliability of official advice","Mitigation":"Diversification of information sources and critical thinking education","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, media literacy programs, and information transparency initiatives","People":"General population","Owner":"Media organizations and educational institutions"}]}
